purchase_intro: Hi {name}, your purchase has been recorded:
invoice_intro: Hi {buyerName}, supplier {supplierName} has issued an invoice for your purchases:
invoice_note: After payment, please mark the invoice as paid in the application.
payment_approved_intro: Hi {buyerName}, supplier {supplierName} has approved your payment for invoice #{id} ({amount} CZK).
payment_rejected_intro: Hi {buyerName}, supplier {supplierName} has rejected the payment for invoice #{id} ({amount} CZK).
payment_rejected_note: Please check your payment and try again.
daily_report_intro: Hi {name}, today you purchased {count} items for a total of {total} CZK:
unpaid_reminder_intro: Hi {buyerName}, invoice #{id} from supplier {supplierName} for {amount} CZK has not been paid yet.
unpaid_reminder_note: After payment, please mark the invoice as paid in the application.
payment_requested_intro: Hi {supplierName}, customer {buyerName} has marked invoice #{id} ({amount} CZK) as paid.
pending_approval_intro: Hi {name}, you have {count} invoices totalling {total} CZK where customers have marked payment as sent:
pending_approval_note: Check payments in your bank account and approve them in the application.
order_cancelled_intro: Hi {buyerName}, your order #{id} for {productName} from supplier {supplierName} for {price} CZK has been cancelled by an administrator.
order_cancelled_note: If you have the product with you, please return it to its original place.
welcome_intro: Hi {name}, your account has been automatically created. You can now order products from the fridge.
welcome_note: If you have any questions or issues, please contact the system administrator.
restock_intro: Hi {name}, product {productName} from supplier {supplierName} is available again.
payment_withdrawn_intro: Hi {supplierName}, customer {buyerName} has withdrawn the payment notification for invoice #{id} ({amount} CZK). The invoice is back to awaiting payment status.
